name: RogueCycles
description:
Description

Inspired by classic rogue like games, RogueCycles is an action role-playing game about a person who is trying to save someone from poison infection. His quest takes him to the dungeons in desperate search for last non poisoned food.

Features
  • Perma death - Like in real life your failure will be fatal
  • Generated dungeons
  • Worldwide statistics - See how many persons were saved, killed and how many times players died
  • Multiple endings - Sometimes even if you save someone its not enough
Controls
  • wasd - move
  • f - action button
  • mouse - look around

Created for: Extra Credits Game Jam #3
